key.name: title-display
key.summary: focused: show focused window title, title: display the window title, app: diplay app name, none: don't display anything

key.name: number-display
key.summary: normal: display window number, smart: display window number if more than one window, none: don't display number, all: display window number for favorites too

key.name: favorites-display
key.summary: favorites: display favorites, pinned-apps: display pinned apps instead of favorites, none: don't display anything

key.name: sort-thumbnails
key.summary: opened: sort by first opened, focused: sort by last focused

key.name: group-apps
key.summary: true: group windows into one app icon, false: every window has it's own icon

key.name: enable-hover-peek
key.summary: true: enable hover peek, false: disable it

key.name: pinned-apps
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for pinned applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites area.
